turns.response: Hey there! Welcome to my restaurant. What can I get for you today? Maybe a slice of our famous Margherita pizza?

turns.response: Excellent choice! You won't regret it. Coming right up!
So, while that's baking, have you ever tried our homemade gnocchi? It's divine.

turns.response: Fantastic! You've got excellent taste. One Margherita and one Caesar salad coming right up.
Is there anything else I can tempt you with today? A glass of our house red perhaps? It pairs beautifully with the pizza.
